content.text: 2 tablespoons light soy sauce (50% less sodium)
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 tablespoons light soy sauce (50% less sodium)" )

content.text: 1 1/4 pounds raw firm fish, such as salmon, tuna or halibut, cut in chunks
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 1/4 pounds raw firm fish, such as salmon, tuna or halibut, cut in chunks" )

content.text: 4 cups fresh pineapple in large chunks (or substitute canned pineapple chunks)
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "4 cups fresh pineapple in large chunks (or substitute canned pineapple chunks)" )

content.text: 1 large red onion, cut in wedges
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 large red onion, cut in wedges" )

content.text: 0) In a small saucepan, dissolve cornstarch in pineapple juice.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "dissolve"@24:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cornstarch"@33:43 / FOOD )
		:gol ( ing-0 "pineapple juice"@47:62 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a small saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add soy sauce, vinegar, garlic and ginger.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "soy sauce"@7:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vinegar"@18:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "garlic"@27:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "ginger"@38:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Simmer until slightly thickened, about 7 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Simmer"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until slightly thickened"@10:34 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "about 7 minutes"@36:51 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Add fish and pineapple to sauce and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "fish"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "pineapple"@16:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "sauce"@29:34 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "marinate"@39:47 / AC
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "the refrigerator"@51:67 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "30 minutes"@72:82 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Thread fish, pineapple and onion on skewers.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Thread"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "fish"@10:14 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "pineapple"@16:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "onion"@30:35 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-5-0 "skewers"@39:46 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Place on a hot grill (or under a broiler) until fish is done to your liking.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( tool-6-0 "a hot grill"@12:23 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-6-1 "under a broiler"@28:43 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until fish is done to your liking"@45:78 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
